trends: There has been one other sighting in Chester
There were no other sightings in Chester on or around December 28th 2012
Summary: Looked like a large pinpoint of light...thought it was a star till I realized it was moving
divs: sighting detailsworking on computer noticed from inside the house through an uncovered window a bright light. thought it was a star until i realized it was moving very very slowly in a very straight line\path. called my fiance to witness, thought maybe was having a dizzy spell and that the object wasn't moving that i was dizzy. my fiance confirmed the thing was moving. we watched it until it got to a certain point and it started to fade then it disappeared. it was much lower than the stars.
